contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|free kick|free kicks}} A '''free kick''' is used to restart play in several codes of football: ;Association football * [[Direct free kick]], from which one may score directly * [[Indirect free kick]], from which one may not score directly ;American football; * [[Safety kick]] * [[Fair catch kick]], a field goal attempted freely from the spot of a fair catch ;Other forms of football * [[Free kick (rugby union)]], usually awarded to a team for a technical offence committed by the opposing side * [[Free kick (Australian rules football)]], a penalty awarded by a field umpire to a player {{disambig}}
